title: How to study for anime quiz
content: Hello hi I have never done pesu quiz b4 what questions can they ask????

comments.body:
1. Go to https://myanimelist.net/topanime.php and Watch every anime on here in order in 4x speed to achieve maximum efficiency 
2. Go to Gigguk’s channel on YouTube and watch every video on 2x speed starting from 2006
3. If you have time left, go to https://myanimelist.net/topanime.php and read the first word of every page of every manga in order to read as much as possible
4. Wake up at 6 in the morning and chant “Tatakae” 31,000 times to be blessed by Eren Yeager

Do all of this and you may be able to answer a few of the questions they ask. Good luck!
